kpi.name: mob_sgsn10d
kpi.formula: (mobmgmnt.succ_inter_sgsn_ra_updat + mobmgmnt.fail_inter_sgsn_ra_updat + mobmgmnt.inter_sgsn_rau_f_ill_ms + mobmgmnt.inter_sgsn_rau_f_ill_me + mobmgmnt.inter_sgsn_rau_f_gprs_na + mobmgmnt.inter_sgsn_rau_f_ms_ident + mobmgmnt.inter_sgsn_rau_f_imp_detach + mobmgmnt.inter_sgsn_rau_f_plmn_na + mobmgmnt.inter_sgsn_rau_f_la_na + mobmgmnt.inter_sgsn_rau_f_roaming_na + mobmgmnt.inter_sgsn_rau_f_gprs_na_pl + mobmgmnt.inter_sgsn_rau_f_no_s_cell + mobmgmnt.inter_sgsn_rau_f_prot_err + mobmgmnt.fail_inter_sgsn_rau_22)

kpi_info.title: Gb Inter SGSN RA update attempts
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the amount of inter SGSN RA update attempts coming from Gb interface. All the failure causes are included.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(SUCC_INTER_SGSN_RA_UPDAT + FAIL_INTER_SGSN_RA_UPDAT +
INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_ILL_MS + INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_ILL_ME +
INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_GPRS_NA + INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_MS_IDENT +
INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_IMP_DETACH + INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_PLMN_NA +
INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_LA_NA + INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_ROAMING_NA +
INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_GPRS_NA_PL + INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_NO_S_CELL +
INTER_SGSN_RAU_F_PROT_ERR + FAIL_INTER_SGSN_RAU_22)

counters from table(s): p_ sgsn_ mobility_ management

kpi.kpi_alias: Gb Inter SGSN RA update attempts
